result.purpose: Defines the structure and behavior of applications, including configuration, startup, shutdown, and service management.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating application and service definitions in separate files for better organization and maintainability.

internal/applications/application.go.purpose: Defines an application structure with configuration, startup, and shutdown handling.

internal/applications/service.go.purpose: Defines service interfaces and a wrapper for daemon services.
